refnamediv.refpurpose: Set the function used to compute the datatip string.

listitem.para: A character string that contains a function name. This function calling sequence must be str=fun(pt) where pt is the vector of datatip coordinates.
This function must return a string or a vector of strings in str.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Set the function used to format the text to be displayed at the datatip point.
